summary: When a terrorist plants a bomb on board a train, the police call in an army bomb disposal expert to find, and dismantle it, but after it has been made safe, he has another shock in store.
cast: Glenn Ford|Anne Vernon|Maurice Denham|Harcourt Williams|Victor Maddern|Harold Warrender|John Horsley|Campbell Singer|Bill Fraser|Herbert C. Walton|Martin Wyldeck|Arthur Hambling|Harry Locke|Frank Atkinson|Ernest Butcher|Jean Anderson|Jack Armstrong|Amy Dalby|Edward Evans|Hilda Fenemore|David Hannaford|Victor Harrington|Peter Illing|Sam Kydd|Jack MacGowran|Jack May|Jack McNaughton|Charlotte Mitchell|Arthur Mullard|Laurence Naismith|Jim O'Brady|Leslie Phillips|Keith Pyott|Ada Reeve|Robert Rietty|Pat Ryan|George Spence|Russell Waters|Daniel Wherry
title: Terror en el tren
